articles.description: The hard work has finally paid off for Australia's John Millman, with the 31-year-old winning his maiden ATP Tour title in his third singles final.
articles.content:
Australia's John Millman has finally secured his maiden ATP Tour title with a straight-sets victory over Frenchman Adrian Mannarino in the final of the Astana Open.
